name: Dicedom - Merge Puzzle
description:
A puzzle game for merging dice to get points.

How to play:
Put the same number of dices together, and three or more dices in a row, whether horizontal or vertical, will merge together.
You can also rotate the dice before placing it.
The game ends when you can't put dice.

Features:
Free games.
Infinite time.
Easy to operate, difficult to master.
